posts.message:
[align=center][img]https://images2.imgbox.com/b5/a3/YMbEd1aE_o.png[/img][/align]

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=5002443][img]https://i.imgur.com/EEflOvL.png[/img][/url][/align]

[color=#ffffff][b]BH-ESCROW SCAMS[/b][/color]
A group of scammers have been found to be running an escrow site designed to target new members of the forum. If any user encourages you to use BH-Escrow.com you should report them to  [mention=1] to be dealt with. You can view additional information about this by viewing [url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6255924][i]this thread[/i][/url].

[color=#ffffff][b]GROUP THREAD PREFIX REMOVAL TOOL[/b][/color]
Group owners were requesting that when a member is removed from their group that their thread lose the Group Prefix. After encountering some complications meeting that request, the decision to add a tool into the GroupCP for the owners to enter a TID (Thread ID) which will reset/empty the threads prefix was implemented to the site. The thread announcing this new feature can be found [url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6256517][i]here[/i][/url].

[color=#ffffff][b]HACK FRIDAY CUSTOM AWARD SALE[/b][/color]
For Hack Friday 2023, users have been given the opportunity to purchase their very own custom award to have on the site and the ability to grant them to other members depending on which package was purchased. You can read the thread announcing this by following [url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6256973][i]this link[/i][/url].

[hr]

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=5002443][img]https://images2.imgbox.com/65/dd/gNmsU5qO_o.png[/img][/url][/align]

[color=#ffffff][b]USER NEWS[/b][/color]

[mention=5002443] was granted [award=7][url=https://hackforums.net/myawards.php?awid=7]The Protector[/url], [award=42][url=https://hackforums.net/myawards.php?awid=42]Support Feather[/url], and [award=25][url=https://hackforums.net/myawards.php?awid=25]Cool[/url] awards.
[mention=18] received the [award=25][url=https://hackforums.net/myawards.php?awid=25]Cool[/url] and [award=26][url=https://hackforums.net/myawards.php?awid=26]Da' Bomb[/url] awards.
[mention=4229993] has earned the [award=20][url=https://hackforums.net/myawards.php?awid=20]Black Hatter[/url] award for the second time.

[mention=1391436] has reached 2,000 popularity.

[color=#ffffff][b]BANS & CLOSURES[/b][/color]

[mention=3550129] requested closure of his account.
[mention=4229993] was banned and shortly after unbanned.
[mention=5270491] was banned permanently while the account is under investigation.
[mention=5362586] was closed for luring members off-site to scam them.
[mention=1404526] was closed for threatening members lives after being banned to have the account investigated.
Many ban-evading losers that eat corn on the cob the long way got excommunicated as well.

[color=#ffffff][b]VACATIONS[/b][/color]

[mention=3498413] has taken a vacation ban for 6-months.
[mention=230053] has taken a vacation ban for 6-months.

[align=center][img]https://images2.imgbox.com/18/99/IMMXY9bI_o.png[/img][/align]
[align=center][img]https://i.gyazo.com/c0a77a779be6b3cb5c08a5b8ca9a0176.png[/img][/align]

[hr]

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=5002443][img]https://i.imgur.com/904SqMN.png[/img][/url][/align]

[color=#ffffff][b]HACK FRIDAY UPGRADES SALE[/b][/color]
A limited time offer was posted to give members the opportunity to purchase lifetime memberships of L33t and Ub3r. You can read about it  [url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6256985][i]here[/i][/url].

[color=#ffffff][b]HACK FRIDAY LEFTOVERS[/b][/color]
[award=9][award=28][award=56][award=57][award=119] were all listed for purchase with bytes for a limited time. The prices were doubled from last years Hack Friday Leftovers sale. The announcement was made with [url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6257112][i]this thread[/i][/url].

[color=#ffffff][b]GROUP LEADER LIMITS[/b][/color]
After a group owner abused the power of granting other members leadership in their group, limitations were put into place to avoid this feature being abused in the future. [mention=1] discusses this change in [url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6255503][i]this thread[/i][/url].

[color=#ffffff][b]GROUP THREADS - PUBLIC DISCUSSION[/b][/color]
Discussion was started about potentially having a page located on showgroups.php that would have select threads from the group available for public view. This would be an interesting way of seeing which groups are contributing content to the site. Join in on the conversation by sharing your thoughts or opinions [url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6255928][i]here[/i][/url].

[color=#ffffff][b]BUY ONE, GET ONE SCRATCHCARDS - GIFT AWARD 2023[/b][/color]
[award=197][b][color=#ffffff]Gift Award 2023[/color][/b] was available for one day only as a part of a Cyber Monday event. Scratchcards had a limited time offer of buy one, get one free and users who purchased $100 or more in scratchcards would receive the award as a bonus. You can view the details on this [url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6257317][i]here[/i][/url]. As of writing this, another new gift award has been added, [award=198] Yellow Gift Award 2023. You can read more about it in the thread provided in this article.

[hr]

[align=center][b][color=#ffffff]SUPPORT THE HF NEWS[/color][/b]

If you would like to support Scribe and Writ3rs, feel free to wear our support signature.[/align]

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6243061][img]https://images2.imgbox.com/42/5f/n5Mnml1G_o.png[/img][/url][/align]
[code][align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6243061][img]https://images2.imgbox.com/42/5f/n5Mnml1G_o.png[/img][/url][/align][/code]

[size=small][align=center][color=#ffffff][i][b]This edition of Hack Forums News is brought to you by [url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6240819]Scribe[/url], the home of the Writ3rs.[/b][/i][/color][/align][/size]
posts.subject: [Happy Holidays] Hack Forums News // E.539 // December 2023
